verses.verse: To <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, I <S%H7121>call.<s%> My <S%H6697>rock,<s%> <S%H2814>don't<s%> be deaf to <S%H2790>me;<s%> lest, if you are silent to <S%H4911>me,<s%> I would become like those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>petitions,<s%> when I <S%H7768>cry<s%> to <S%H5375>you,<s%> when I lift up my <S%H3027>hands<s%> toward your Most <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H1687>Place.<s%>

<S%H4900>Don't<s%> draw me away with the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbors,<s%> but <S%H7451>mischief<s%> is in their <S%H3824>hearts.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> them according to their <S%H6467>work,<s%> and according to the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> them according to the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%> <S%H7725>Bring<s%> back on them what they <S%H1576>deserve.<s%>

Because they <S%H995>don't<s%> respect the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> nor the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> he will <S%H2040>break<s%> them down and not build them <S%H1129>up.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>petitions.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H4043>shield.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> has <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H5826>him,<s%> and I am helped. Therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> greatly <S%H5937>rejoices.<s%> With my <S%H7892>song<s%> I will thank <S%H3034>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is their <S%H5797>strength.<s%> He is a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
<S%H3467>Save<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> Be their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5375>also,<s%> and bear them up <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
